text: Jerry Casale (September 27, 1933 - February 9, 2019) was an American baseball player. He was a starting pitcher in Major League Baseball who played for three different teams between 1958 and 1962. Casale played for the Boston Red Sox, Los Angeles Angels and the Detroit Tigers. He was born in Brooklyn, New York. Casale died on February 9, 2019 in Paramus, New Jersey at the age of 85.Jerry Casale's Obituary ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Boston Red Sox players Category:Los Angeles Angels players Category:Detroit Tigers players Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Jerry Casale
